name: One Roll
description:
This game was made for the GMTK 2019 game jam. The theme this year was:

" Only One"

So in this game you get only one stat roll, so 1 - 20 for 3 stats that all make your character who they are. This persists even through closing the game. The only way to change your stats is to succeed with your roll and to find a blue potion. Best of luck to you Dungeoneers.

Notes:

Also Axes can parry arrows, swords cannot.

Barrels can be broken

Arrows can hurt the person who made them (don't run into your own arrows)

Controls:

WASD: Move

Left Click = Attack

Art: My Compatriot Draosey, did great work on all art and theming
